code: import firebase from'../data/base';import user from'../assets/images/user/user.png';var db=firebase.firestore();export var createUser=function createUser(value,avatar){db.collection('contactApp').add({avatar:avatar?avatar:user,name:value.name,surname:value.surname,mobile:value.mobile,age:value.age,nameToSearch:value.name.toLowerCase()});};export var deletedUser=function deletedUser(userId){return firebase.firestore().collection('contactApp').doc(userId).delete();};export var editUser=function editUser(value,url,userId){db.collection('contactApp').doc(userId).set({avatar:url?url:null,name:value.name,surname:value.surname,mobile:value.mobile,age:value.age,nameToSearch:value.name.toLowerCase()});};
